#glossary.label: Glossary
#glossary.definition: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.
#glossary.abstract: Glossaries are collections of terms and their definitions.

#taxonomy.label: Taxonomy
#taxonomy.definition: Taxonomies are classification schemes. Terms in a taxonomy give names to sets of things. Classes are often put into relation via hierarchical relation ships to express super and subclasses of things.

#thesaurus.label: Thesaurus
#thesaurus.definition: Thesauri are word nets. They are informal sets of terms which are put into relation.
